comment.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_1_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): When will you register a Namecoin for RVRE? I've made an entry for RVRE on ZeroSites and I'll gladly update it when you get a human-friendly address.

Thanks for making the entry! As for the domain, I'm not sure.  I have one left over from Bwoi (bwoi.bit) but I've got no clue when I'll actually get a RVRE one.  I'm hoping that I'll get round to it within the next few days (need to get namecoin!).

> [sickphone](#comment_1_1HvxgPnxu6yB9Ao8AS4zMH4Zo9QLyjGv21): Hello, thanks!Is possible to add Burton for sample search?

What do you mean by a 'sample search'??
